0.06.text: G'day viewers, my name's Graeme Stevenson and I'd like

4.06.text: invite you to come on a journey of creativity and learning and adventure through the series

8.06.text: Colour In Your Life. There's and artist in every family throughout the world.

12.06.text: Lots of times there's an artist deep down inside all of us as well.

16.06.text: So grab your kids, your brothers, your sisters, your aunties,

20.06.text: uncles, and mums and dads, and come and see how some of the best artists

65.00.text: welcome back to Colour In Your Life. Well we are in Bay of Plenty in New Zealand,

68.00.text: at Turanga. And I am with a lovely lady:

71.00.text: Doreen McNeill. Welcome to the show. [Doreen] Pleased to meet you Graeme. [Graeme] It's wonderful to be here. Now

77.00.text: Doreen has a fascinating history. Obviously

81.00.text: you've been painting for a long, long time. [Doreen] A long time. [Graeme] But this is a lady

85.00.text: that came through the second World War, and then ended up coming from,

89.00.text: you always had a great love of art, even as a child. [Doreen] Oh yeah, I loved painting.

93.00.text: [Graeme] Yeah. [Doreen] Painting and drawing and color. [Graeme] And the thing was in England

97.00.text: in those days, obviously after the war, there really wasn't many places you could go

101.00.text: to where you could learn art. [Doreen] No, nowhere at all that I could find.

105.00.text: All I found was someone teaching me to draw from little

109.00.text: paster casts [Graeme] Yeah. [Doreen] in pencil, on small pieces of paper.

113.00.text: And really just telling me to draw - and that was it. And I wanted

117.00.text: color in my life. [Graeme] Yeah, funnily enough. But you went on

121.00.text: to do cartography and ariel drawings for

125.00.text: for aircraft. [Doreen] Yeah, it was closest I could get to anything

129.00.text: sort of art work was as a draftsman.

133.00.text: And I ended up with a navigation company which had

137.00.text: this new system for guiding aircraft. [Graeme] Yeah. [Doreen] And

141.00.text: I really enjoyed it. It was so exciting, it was a new

145.00.text: form of navigation. But the work was tight and

149.00.text: tedious. [Graeme] Yeah. [Doreen] No not tedious, but tight and meticulous.

153.00.text: [Graeme] Yeah. [Doreen] And I really wanted to let loose and paint, which

157.00.text: I couldn't do there. [Graeme] Yeah. You moved to the Bahamas in the fifties was it?

161.00.text: [Doreen] Yeah. [Graeme] Fifties, [Doreen] Late fifties. [Graeme] and then found a lady there that obviously started

165.00.text: to teach you  [Doreen] Yes. [Graeme] what you wanted to know.  But obviously coming from that really tight

173.00.text: Doreen is one of the Grand Dames of abstract art in New Zealand

177.00.text: these days. [Doreen] About that. [Graeme] So it's a really privilege to be here, but

181.00.text: that's what we're going to do today. We're going to do some of your abstract works.

189.00.text: then just make a great start. But this is, your works really from

193.00.text: the heart, in many senses. [Doreen] Yeah, I just put down some color and see what

197.00.text: happens. Once you've got one color down and things start to happen, and [Graeme] Yeah.

200.30.text: [Doreen]  if I need another color and move it around and just play. I love

205.00.text: playing with paint. It's childish I suppose, but I love it.

209.00.text: you just see what happens. [Graeme] Absolutely. Well lets make a start

213.00.text: and we'll see where it goes, because it's going to be very interesting. I mean one of the great abstract

217.00.text: artists of New Zealand. It's going to be a great day. Lets go.

1321.00.text: [Graeme] Thank you. [Doreen] Putting more and more color in my life. [Graeme] Absolutely. But if people would

1325.00.text: like to come and see more of your work and even have a chat with you, what's your web site address?

1333.00.text: .co.nz.  Also as always, you can come to

1341.00.text: plenty of subscribers in there. And we've got some fantastic DVD's out these days.

1345.00.text: And come into the web site and have a look because we've got some pretty amazing things

1349.00.text: happening in there these days. We've got webinars, resources, bonuses.

1353.00.text: We'll even have Doreen in there at some stage having a talk to the many fans across

1357.00.text: the world, so definitely pop in and see us. We've had a fantastic time in

1361.00.text: New Zealand. The people are amazing. We hope to get back here in the next couple of

1365.00.text: months to film some more people. But we're going to head off, but as we always say,

1369.00.text: remember guys - make sure you put some color in your life, and we'll see you again. Bye now.
